How many people are affected by familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy ?,Familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy affects an estimated 1 in 500 people worldwide. It is the most common genetic heart disease in the United States.,GHR,familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
